DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from (select distinct callerid from gwcalls where year(starttime)='%{YearMon[year]}' and month(starttime)='%{YearMon[month]}' and day(starttime)='%{YearMon[day]}' and calleeid='%{SearchTp0}' and duration!=0) as a

Data.Data: sql:select * from TimeSegmentCITS order by id asc
Data.DataFormat: sum(case when a.indate between '%{BeginTime}' and '%{EndTime}' then 1 else 0 end) as '%{BeginTime}-%{EndTime}'

DbDetails.Where: where year(starttime)='%{YearMon[year]}' and month(starttime)='%{YearMon[month]}' and day(starttime)='%{YearMon[day]}' and calleeid='%{SearchTp0}'
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from (SELECT cdrid,substring(starttime,1,10) as days,substring(starttime,12,5) AS indate from %{dbtable} %{where}) as a
